CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- /ui/GameStartUI/GameStartPanel -- 게임 매치 UI에서 각 버튼 동작 관련 코드

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
-- 각 버튼 세팅
local Entity = self.Entity
local SoloPlayButton = Entity:GetChildByName("SoloPlay") local MultiPlayButton = Entity:GetChildByName("MultiPlay") local BuilderTutorialButton = Entity:GetChildByName("BuilderTutorial") local CharacterTutorialButton = Entity:GetChildByName("CharacterTutorial")
SoloPlayButton:ConnectEvent(ButtonClickEvent, self.SoloPlay) MultiPlayButton:ConnectEvent(ButtonClickEvent, self.MultiPlay) BuilderTutorialButton:ConnectEvent(ButtonClickEvent, self.BuilderTutorial) CharacterTutorialButton:ConnectEvent(ButtonClickEvent, self.CharacterTutorial)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SoloPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if Environment:IsPCPlatform() then if self.Entity.Visible == true then self.Entity:SetVisible(false) self.Entity:SetEnable(false) end
local LobbyMap = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/Lobby") LobbyMap.GameMatchManager:StartSoloGame(_UserService.LocalPlayer) end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: MultiPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local Entity = self.Entity local LocalPlayer = _UserService.LocalPlayer local GameMatchManager = LocalPlayer.CurrentMap.GameMatchManager
local GameMatchingPanel = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/GameMatchingUI/GameMatchingPanel")
Entity:SetVisible(false) Entity:SetEnable(false)
-- 현재 PC환경과 플레이어 정보를 넘기고 매칭 대기열에 플레이어를 넣음 GameMatchManager:MultiGameMatchStart(LocalPlayer.Name, LocalPlayer, Environment:IsPCPlatform()) GameMatchingPanel.GameMatchingPanelUI:MatchingStartPanelOn()

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity --------------------------------------------------------
local GameStartPanel = Entity.Parent
GameStartPanel:SetVisible(false) GameStartPanel:SetEnable(false)
